thought: The aiCompletion action requires 'messages' to be passed in the input_data as a list with one item containing 'json' key holding the messages list. Currently, action_0 is called with empty input_data [], causing empty output and KeyError in mainWorkflow. I will fix action_0 to pass the correct input_data with messages and empty params.
plan: Rewrite action_0 to pass input_data with one item containing 'json' key holding the messages list for joke generation.
Test action_0 alone to verify it returns output with joke text.
Update mainWorkflow to use the corrected action_0 output.
Implement action_1 params to send email with joke text.
criticism: The main weakness is misunderstanding the input_data format for aiCompletion. Passing empty input_data causes no AI call and empty output.

tool_input.comments: Generate a joke within 30 words using aiCompletion. Pass 'messages' in input_data as list with one item containing 'json' key holding messages list. Params is empty dict.
TODO: Test AI completion with messages in input_data and empty params.
